messages.subject: Unschooling and food, a book (you could contribute!)
messages.msgSnippet: There s a blog post, and one quote from it is below.  I m going to send a monkey-platter note and photo.  My favorite monkey platter plate got broken last
messages.messageBody:
There's a blog post, and one quote from it is below. I'm going to
send a monkey-platter note and photo. My favorite monkey platter
plate got broken last summer, and I want to use that picture of it. I
had had it for 20 years.

I thought this might be a project some of you would enjoy, though.
Faith Void Taintor is the organizer (it's her blog, anyway).

-----------
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/enjoy-life-unschooling-press/

"The first work will be a cook book with easy family friendly recipes
and short stories from people who have overcome food issues. The book
will also include photographs."

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
